thread.title: PayPal acquires money-sending service Xoom for USD890m
thread.title_full: PayPal acquires money-sending service Xoom for USD890m | MENAFN.COM

title: PayPal acquires money-sending service Xoom for USD890m
text:
(MENAFN) Online payment giant PayPal announced that it is acquiring international money-sending service Xoom in a deal worth more than USD890 million, AFP reported.

PayPal, a subsidiary of eBay, will pay USD25 per share of Xoom in what accounts for a premium of 32 percent over the stock's average price over the past three months.

Acquiring Xoom will let PayPal broaden its array of services and expand in important markets, particularly China, Brazil, India, Mexico and the Philippines, according to president.

"Expanding into international money transfer and remittances aligns with our strategic vision to democratize the movement and management of money," PayPal president said.
